description:
Rumors of Onsen Mark`s retirement swirl around Tomobiki High while he`s out on sabbatical. However, the gruff teacher returns with plans to hold a school-wide marathon before he`s gone for good!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good-bye Onsen-Sensei!? Tearful Good-bye Marathon Banquet!
さらば温泉先生!? 涙の送別マラソン大会
